meanings.sent1: The branniest cereal had a lot of fiber.
meanings.sent2: The bran muffin was the branniest item on the menu.
meanings.sent3: The branniest bread made everyone feel healthy.
meanings.sent4: Her breakfast choice was the branniest of them all.
meanings.sent5: The branniest cereal kept her full until lunchtime.

meanings.definition: Showing the most intelligence or cleverness.
meanings.sent1: The branniest student always aced the tests.
meanings.sent2: Her branniest idea saved the project from failure.
meanings.sent3: The branniest detective solved the case in record time.
meanings.sent4: His branniest move was outsmarting his opponents.
meanings.sent5: Being the branniest in the class made her popular among peers.

meanings.sent1: The branniest horse galloped with energy across the field.
meanings.sent2: Her branniest dance moves lit up the stage.
meanings.sent3: The branniest debate got everyone fired up.
meanings.sent4: His branniest performance brought the audience to their feet.
meanings.sent5: The branniest sports team never gave up until the final whistle.
